Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix patient saving by cleaning empty string fields

- Filter out empty strings before sending to Firestore
- Keep arrays \(allergies, diagnoses\) even if empty
- Keep numbers \(acuity\) as-is
- Only send fields with actual values
- Apply same cleaning to both create and update operations

Fixes issue where empty form fields prevented patient creation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Detect ward names from row headers in Google Sheets import

The sheet uses ward names as section header rows \(e.g. "Ward 10" in
a row by itself\) rather than a dedicated ward column. The parser now
auto-detects these rows and assigns the ward to all subsequent patients
until the next ward header. Removed wardId from default column mappings
since wards come from rows.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
